description:
The zombies are back! Okay, to be fair, they never really left. But after a season in which the survivors on The Walking Dead were more concerned with the human threat of the Governor than the flesh-eaters right outside their prison gates, the biters will be taking center stage again when the AMC hit returns in mid-October for season 4. “The first episode, we had days where there were 150 walkers,” brags exec producer and zombie makeup guru Greg Nicotero.僵尸们又回来了！好吧，说句实在话，他们从来都没有离开过。但是在上季的《行尸走肉》中，比起在监狱门外的僵尸们，来自人类州长的威胁更大。不过，AMC这部热播剧在10月中旬回归第四季时，僵尸们将会继续占据重要角色。“第一集，我们会出现150个僵尸。”制片人告诉我们。

“The new threat is something you can’t just stab in the face,” says new showrunner Scott M. Gimple. “You can’t talk sense to it. You can’t make a truce with it. It’s beyond all that. It would be a threat in any world, but in this world it is much more terrifying.” Yikes!“新的威胁是某种扎脸也没用的东西，”新制作人斯科特说，“你不能和它讲道理，不能和它休战，这很重要。在任何世界它都是一种威胁，而在这个世界就更恐怖了。”哎呀！

That sounds like bad news for our heroes. But the good news for us is that they at least survived long enough to pose for a series of new Entertainment Weekly covers offering a new exclusive sneak peek at season 4 of the zombie drama.听起来对我们的英雄们是个坏消息，但是好消息是最起码这几位已经生存了足够久的时间，能够来为新一期的《娱乐周刊》行尸走肉第四季的独家专栏拍摄杂志封面。

title: 行尸走肉第四季封面照 三大男主亮相
